Property.name: Restrictions
Property.val: Please refer to the cancer protocol cover page (www.cap.org/cancerprotocols) for information about which tumor types and procedures can be reported using this template.

DisplayedItem.name: DI_39617
DisplayedItem.title: # This protocol applies to adrenal cortical carcinomas in all age groups.

ListItem.name: LI_20900
ListItem.title: Urinary 17-ketosteroids increased (10 mg / g creatinine / 24 hours)

Question.name: Q_820395
Question.title: ?Mitotic Tumor Grade (required for adult patients only) (Notes C, D)

ListItem.name: LI_820396
ListItem.title: Low grade (less than or equal to 20 mitoses per 10 mm2)

ListItem.name: LI_820397
ListItem.title: High grade (greater than 20 mitoses per 10 mm2)

DisplayedItem.name: DI_57980
DisplayedItem.title: # Generally due to core needle biopsy, with insufficient viable tumor to count 10 mm2.

Question.name: Q_820404
Question.title: Site(s) Involved by Direct Tumor Extension

ListItem.name: LI_820406
ListItem.title: Confined to adrenal cortex without invasion into or through the adrenal capsule (if present)

Property.name: p_rptTxt_820406_1
Property.val: Confined to adrenal cortex without invasion into or through the adrenal capsule

ListItem.name: LI_820407
ListItem.title: Invades into or through the adrenal capsule, with no peri-adrenal adipose tissue invasion

ListItem.name: LI_44186
ListItem.title: Not applicable (no evidence of primary tumor)

Question.name: Q_39990
Question.title: Lymphatic and / or Vascular Invasion (Note H)

ListItem.name: LI_52962
ListItem.title: Large vessel invasion, renal vein (including when identified clinically or grossly)

ListItem.name: LI_59454
ListItem.title: Large vessel invasion, vena cava (including when identified clinically or grossly)

ListItem.name: LI_43597
ListItem.title: Large vessel invasion, not otherwise specified

Question.name: Q_354236
Question.title: Distance from Carcinoma to Closest Margin

ListItem.name: LI_1868
ListItem.title: Not applicable (no regional lymph nodes submitted or found)

ListItem.name: LI_354281
ListItem.title: All regional lymph nodes negative for tumor

ListItem.name: LI_354288
ListItem.title: Tumor present in regional lymph node(s)

Question.name: Q_45098
Question.title: Number of Lymph Nodes with Tumor

DisplayedItem.name: DI_51087
DisplayedItem.title: Reporting of pT, pN, and (when applicable) pM categories is based on information available to the pathologist at the time the report is issued. As per the AJCC (Chapter 1, 8th Ed.) it is the managing physician’s responsibility to establish the final pathologic stage based upon all pertinent information, including but potentially not limited to this pathology report.

Property.name: p_rptTxt_51087_1
Property.val: Reporting of pT, pN, and (when applicable) pM categories is based on information available to the pathologist at the time the report is issued. As per the AJCC (Chapter 1, 8th Ed.) it is the managing physician’s responsibility to establish the final pathologic stage based upon all pertinent information, including but potentially not limited to this pathology report.

DisplayedItem.name: DI_20894
DisplayedItem.title: There is no category of carcinoma in situ (pTis) relative to carcinomas of the adrenal gland.

ListItem.name: LI_327637
ListItem.title: pT not assigned (cannot be determined based on available pathological information)

ListItem.name: LI_20889
ListItem.title: pT0: No evidence of primary tumor

ListItem.name: LI_2138
ListItem.title: pT1: Tumor less than or equal to 5 cm in greatest dimension, no extra-adrenal invasion

ListItem.name: LI_2139
ListItem.title: pT2: Tumor greater than 5 cm, no extra-adrenal invasion

ListItem.name: LI_2140
ListItem.title: pT3: Tumor of any size with local invasion, but not invading adjacent organs

ListItem.name: LI_2141
ListItem.title: pT4: Tumor of any size with invasion of adjacent organs (kidney, diaphragm, pancreas, spleen, or liver) or large blood vessels (renal vein or vena cava)

ListItem.name: LI_820588
ListItem.title: (m) multiple primary synchronous tumors in a single organ

ListItem.name: LI_327639
ListItem.title: pN not assigned (no nodes submitted or found)

ListItem.name: LI_327640
ListItem.title: pN not assigned (cannot be determined based on available pathological information)

ListItem.name: LI_2145
ListItem.title: pN0: No regional lymph node metastasis

ListItem.name: LI_2146
ListItem.title: pN1: Metastasis in regional lymph node(s)

Question.name: Q_2149
Question.title: ?pM Category (required only if confirmed pathologically) (Note K)

ListItem.name: LI_20895
ListItem.title: ?Not applicable - pM cannot be determined from the submitted specimen(s)

Property.name: p_rptTxt_20895_1
Property.val: Not applicable - pM cannot be determined from the submitted specimen(s)

Question.name: Q_820445
Question.title: ?Biomarkers Confirming Adrenal Cortical Origin (select positive biomarker(s)) (required only if applicable)#

DisplayedItem.name: DI_820446
DisplayedItem.title: # Required for all non-functional adrenal tumors. SF1 (steroidogenic factor-1) is the most reliable biomarker. The remaining biomarkers listed are non-specific.

Question.name: Q_378870
Question.title: Reticulin Stain Results (specify type(s) and result(s))

Question.name: Q_378871
Question.title: Other Ancillary Study Findings (specify type(s) and result(s))
